ygData.subject: CKReader bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: Two bugs have been found in CKReader, Cantera s parser for Chemkin-format mechanism files. These do not affect GRI-Mech 3.0, but may affect other mechanism

Two bugs have been found in CKReader, Cantera's parser for
Chemkin-format mechanism files. These do not affect GRI-Mech 3.0, but
may affect other mechanism files. 

1. If the last reaction in a mechanism has auxiliary data lines, the END
statement may not be read correctly.

2. The midpoint temperature is not being read from the individual THERMO
records. Instead, the default value specified on the second line of the
thermo database is used. This bug was introduced at the time the MATLAB
interface was released last April. Older versions of Cantera do not have
this problem.  

Corrected versions will be posted as soon as possible.
